name: GIBAX
metaTitle: GIBAX Golf Properties Costa Blanca | New Build Homes
metaDescription: Discover exclusive GIBAX golf properties in Lo Sereno Golf. 2 premium developments combining luxury living with world-class golf amenities on the Costa Blanca.
heroHeadline: GIBAX - Golf Living Redefined on the Costa Blanca
heroIntro:
GIBAX specialises in creating premium residential developments that seamlessly integrate golf lifestyle into modern living. We're showcasing 2 exceptional properties from GIBAX's portfolio, all designed for discerning buyers seeking both luxury homes and access to championship golf courses.

With a singular focus on golf-oriented communities, GIBAX develops properties in prime locations across the Costa Blanca. Their flagship Velapi Golf development in Lo Sereno Golf demonstrates their commitment to combining architectural excellence with unparalleled golf access. Each property reflects GIBAX's philosophy of creating homes where golf isn't just a pastime—it's part of your daily lifestyle.

aboutSection.title: About GIBAX
aboutSection.content:
GIBAX has established itself as a specialist developer in golf community real estate, creating residential environments that cater to golf enthusiasts and luxury homebuyers. Their developments are strategically positioned within established golf zones, offering residents direct access to premium courses and a community built around shared interests.

The developer's approach combines contemporary architecture with sustainable design principles, ensuring properties appreciate over time while maintaining the highest construction standards. GIBAX understands that golf properties require a different approach—one that respects both the sport and the natural landscape.

specializationSection.title: Golf-Focused Residential Development
specializationSection.content:
GIBAX specialises exclusively in golf community development, a niche that requires deep understanding of both residential design and golf course operations. Each property is positioned to maximise golf course views and access, with layouts designed for residents who prioritise their golfing lifestyle.

Located in Lo Sereno Golf, GIBAX's Velapi Golf development showcases how modern residential architecture can complement a golf environment. Properties are designed with consideration for orientation, privacy, and the unique requirements of golfers—from direct course access to professional-grade landscaping that mirrors championship standards.

qualitySection.title: Quality & Specifications
features: Premium construction materials and finishes throughout
Optimised orientation for golf course views
Landscaping designed by golf environment specialists
Direct or near-direct golf course access
qualitySection.content: GIBAX maintains rigorous quality standards across all developments, with particular attention to the specific requirements of golf-oriented living. Each property undergoes comprehensive quality assurance, ensuring that finishes, materials, and installations meet international standards. The developer works with specialised consultants who understand how to integrate residential living with golf course proximity, from drainage specifications to landscaping that complements rather than conflicts with the playing environment.

reasons.title: Specialist Golf Developer
reasons.description: GIBAX's exclusive focus on golf communities means every design decision prioritises the golfer's lifestyle and experience.

reasons.title: Prime Golf Locations
reasons.description: Properties are strategically positioned within established golf zones with direct access to championship courses.

reasons.title: Investment Potential
reasons.description: Golf-oriented residential property in premium Costa Blanca locations demonstrates strong appreciation and rental demand.

faqs.question: Where are GIBAX properties located?
faqs.answer: GIBAX developments are located in Lo Sereno Golf on the Costa Blanca, with properties in the Velapi Golf development offering prime positioning within the golf community.

faqs.question: What type of properties does GIBAX develop?
faqs.answer: GIBAX specialises in luxury villas and golf-view homes designed specifically for golf enthusiasts, combining premium residential living with golf course access.

faqs.question: Are GIBAX properties suitable for investment?
faqs.answer: Yes, GIBAX properties in established golf zones show strong investment potential, with both appreciation and rental income opportunities from the golf tourism market.

conclusion: GIBAX properties represent a distinctive opportunity for buyers seeking luxury homes within active golf communities. Whether you're a serious golfer, investor, or someone seeking a unique lifestyle property, our current portfolio of 2 GIBAX homes offers the quality and positioning you're looking for. Browse our available listings to find your perfect golf community home on the Costa Blanca.
